data.prayer: Father, please, raise up a generation of disciples in the state of Matabeleland North who will make disciples who make disciples.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Matabeleland North, Zimbabwe

data.prayer: Please, teach the 188,901 believers in Matabeleland North, Zimbabwe how to pray to you and how to listen for your voice. That they might follow you into the good works you have prepared for them.
data.verse: My sheep listen to my voice; I know them, and they follow me.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 3 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Jesus, teach the local leaders in Matabeleland North, Zimbabwe to be humble and to serve others.
data.verse: It shall not be so among you. But whoever would be great among you must be your servant, and whoever would be first among you must be your slave, even as the Son of Man came not to be served but to serve, and to give his life as a ransom for many.

data.prayer: Jesus, please raise up evangelists to equip your people to share the gospel in Matabeleland North.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Father, as people seek answers on the internet, please help them find the gospel in Matabeleland North, Zimbabwe.
data.verse: So I say to you, ask, and it will be given to you; seek, and you will find; knock, and it will be opened to you.

data.prayer: Spirit, fill the 188,901 believers in the state of Matabeleland North with tears, because God is not obeyed by those around them.
data.verse: Streams of tears flow from my eyes, for your law is not obeyed.

data.section_summary:
the state of Matabeleland North, Zimbabwe has a population of 749,000.

We estimate Matabeleland North has 188,901 people who might know Jesus, 386,545 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 173,554 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 3 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Lord, make the 188,901 believers in Matabeleland North to be brave and clear with the gospel to their 560,099 neighbors.
data.verse: So Paul and Barnabas spent considerable time there, speaking boldly for the Lord, who confirmed the message of his grace by enabling them to perform signs and wonders.

location.name: Matabeleland North
location.cities_list: Hwange, Inyati, Dete, Kamativi Mine, Lupane
location.cities_list_w_pop: Hwange (33,210), Inyati (8,402), Dete (2,993), Kamativi Mine (1,575), Lupane (1,200)
